programme.title: Kalyug
programme.desc: Directed by Mohit Suri, Kalyug stars Kunal Khemu in his debut adult role. The film follows his character's descent into the pornographic underworld after a personal tragedy. As he seeks revenge, he uncovers the industry's seedy operations, leading to a gripping narrative about morality and redemption.

programme.title: Coolie No. 1
programme.desc: In this classic David Dhawan comedy, Raju, a railway coolie, is roped into a scheme to pose as a millionaire to marry the daughter of a status-obsessed man. As lies pile up, Raju juggles his dual identity, resulting in a series of humorous situations.

programme.title: NH 10
programme.desc: NH10 is an intense survival thriller starring Anushka Sharma as Meera, a woman who embarks on a road trip with her husband, only to witness an honor killing. When they intervene, they find themselves hunted by the perpetrators in a lawless rural region. The film explores themes of gender violence, societal injustice, and the terrifying vulnerability of urban citizens in rural anarchy. Directed by Navdeep Singh, NH10 delivers gripping tension, gritty realism, and a powerful female lead performance.

programme.title: Kahaani 2
programme.desc: Kahaani 2: Durga Rani Singh is a suspense thriller and spiritual successor to the acclaimed Kahaani. It stars Vidya Balan as Vidya Sinha/Durga Rani Singh, a woman whose daughter is kidnapped, leading to a series of events that unravel a dark and painful history. As the investigation progresses, hidden identities, shocking truths, and psychological tension come to the forefront. Directed by Sujoy Ghosh, the film is packed with emotional depth, twists, and a compelling lead performance.

programme.title: Go Goa Gone
programme.desc: Three slackers attend a rave party on a secluded island in Goa, only to discover it's infested with zombies. With help from a Russian mafioso who claims to be a zombie hunter, they must escape alive in this hilarious genre-bending film.
